md:
giải nghĩa từ "post" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

1. Post (noun) - Bưu điện
	* Meaning: A place where mail and packages are sent and received.
	* Example sentence: "I need to go to the post office to send a package to my friend."
	* Related words: mail, package, letter, delivery
	* Antonyms: none

2. Post (noun) - Bài đăng
	* Meaning: A piece of writing or a message on the internet, especially on social media.
	* Example sentence: "I saw your post on Facebook and I loved it!"
	* Related words: social media, online, comment, share
	* Antonyms: none

3. Post (verb) - Đăng
	* Meaning: To put a piece of writing or a message on the internet, especially on social media.
	* Example sentence: "I'm going to post a picture of my new puppy on Instagram."
	* Related words: share, upload, publish, online
	* Antonyms: delete, remove

4. Post (noun) - Cột
	* Meaning: A vertical pole or structure used to support or mark something.
	* Example sentence: "The post in the ground held up the fence."
	* Related words: pole, pillar, column, support
	* Antonyms: none

5. Post (verb) - Đặt
	* Meaning: To put something in a particular position or place.
	* Example sentence: "Can you post the sign on the door?"
	* Related words: place, put, position, set
	* Antonyms: remove, take away
html:
giải nghĩa từ "post" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

  1. Post (noun) - Bưu điện

    • Meaning: A place where mail and packages are sent and received.
    • Example sentence: "I need to go to the post office to send a package to my friend."
    • Related words: mail, package, letter, delivery
    • Antonyms: none

  2. Post (noun) - Bài đăng

    • Meaning: A piece of writing or a message on the internet, especially on social media.
    • Example sentence: "I saw your post on Facebook and I loved it!"
    • Related words: social media, online, comment, share
    • Antonyms: none

  3. Post (verb) - Đăng

    • Meaning: To put a piece of writing or a message on the internet, especially on social media.
    • Example sentence: "I'm going to post a picture of my new puppy on Instagram."
    • Related words: share, upload, publish, online
    • Antonyms: delete, remove

  4. Post (noun) - Cột

    • Meaning: A vertical pole or structure used to support or mark something.
    • Example sentence: "The post in the ground held up the fence."
    • Related words: pole, pillar, column, support
    • Antonyms: none

  5. Post (verb) - Đặt

    • Meaning: To put something in a particular position or place.
    • Example sentence: "Can you post the sign on the door?"
    • Related words: place, put, position, set
    • Antonyms: remove, take away
